projects.title: Check out my Master's portfolio!
projects.description:
I completed UBC's Master of Education program in 2022. Fondly known as the MET program, the mix of hands-on and theoretical learning ultimately produced a body of work that showcases my desire to learn by doing. The goal was to 'show off' artifacts I built throughout the program, but I wanted to do so in a way that allowed me to experiment with new technologies - enter Gatsby and React! 
 Photo by Susan Q Yin on Unsplash

projects.title: Tableau Desktop: My Intro to Data Viz
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Carlos Muza on Unsplash.
